task_description: Facing the building to your West (approx. 287°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to estimate the height of the building in front of me, so I will first look up to see its full extent and count the number of floors.

I can now see the top of the building; by combining this view with the previous one, I can count approximately 11 floors plus a taller ground floor and a mechanical level, so I will estimate the height and stop.
